item.title: "Why aren't we funding this?"
item.description: I don't care if it's communism, capitalism, socialism, or dudeism. We aren't even talking about which one best gets us to a Star-Trek utopia. That utopia doesn't even appear to be on the table for discussion. Fuck fighting for healthcare or SNAP. Fuck incrementalism. The conversation of ANY political proposition should be "Does this get us closer to a state where ALL needs are met?" Idealistic rant over.
item.dc:creator: TheSecondPiewackit

item.title: Fine day for a swim
item.description:
You may not know it from this photo, but I am NOT a winter person lol A shred of context is in order - back in 2021 a company mailed me an Etch A Sketch pool float. In February. Perfect time for a photo shoot though right?
Those heart-shaped sunglasses are doing a fantastic job of masking approximately 85% of the existential self-inflicted misery I was feeling throughout this photo shoot lmao
Hope you're all keeping safe and warm, fellow Imgurians. It's rough out there, and I'm not just talking about the weather :( Many of you have personally expressed to me that you enjoy that I keep it light and fun here, and I promise to continue sharing my whimsical ablutions (update: ablutions? Honestly I have no idea what I was going for here. I'll say uh... Journeys? Activities? Idk I'm tired from shoveling through ice) as we forge through this dark and cold winter ahead. Hopefully this post gave you if anything a brief chuckle. A tiny little break from the state of the world. Stay tuned for the next silly seminar in a curious ensemble!
item.dc:creator: pikajane

26 Imgur Creator Spotlight: @kamikaye shared their latest painting. Lovely! Take a look at their other posts. Much good.
27 Man Tax: Nick Bateman
“Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world.” - Margaret Mead So, I made a discord server. It's a relaxed environment where you can take/donate memes to the cause, play trivia twice a week, chat about lots of topics or about nothing at all. We also have Jack Box game night and are setting up movie night! Very laid back/relaxed vibe. Come hang with us. https://discord.gg/AWFV7FT3RQ I'm also on the imgcat server for updates & fun: https://discord.gg/TpjD37jgJ9 ***Also if you miss abbiistabbii's discord community good news! Here's the new one https://discord.gg/NPStJGgARq - where everyone's reconnecting, shitposting, and hanging out again*** https://ko-fi.com/mememuseumcurator Unable to work, zero income. Feel free to leave me a tip. Those that have, y'all are the bee's knees. You've honestly been my lifeline. ***Tag me if you see an artist/creator you like whose work isn't getting seen as much as it should be! Or if you are an artist/creator and want me to post something of yours, DM me

item.title: GovBrief Today #362
item.description: ICE agents killing two people in Minneapolis has scarred the country. House Democrats had already threatened to impeach DHS head Kristi Noem over the carnage and fear her agents have caused. Then a federal agent tried to enter the Ecuadorian consulate in Minnesota this morning. Ecuador called it an "attempted incursion" and filed a diplomatic protest. Later in the evening, a man attacked Rep. Ilhan Omar with a syringe at a town hall where she demanded Noem's resignation. The anger spread to Manhattan, where 60 protesters swarmed a Hilton lobby demanding the hotel stop housing federal agents. The administration bet this would fade in a news cycle, but it’s growing. We've emailed 5,800+ stories over 362 straight nights. Stop hoping the algorithm shows them to you. govbrief.today #GovBriefToday #Resist Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com [1] https://go.govbrief.today/omar-attacked [2] https://go.govbrief.today/bessent-carney [3] https://go.govbrief.today/greenland-red-line [4] https://go.govbrief.today/us-paris-pullout [5] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-iowa-rally [6] https://go.govbrief.today/cyber-chief-chatgpt [7] https://go.govbrief.today/boat-attack-lawsuit [8] https://go.govbrief.today/judge-protects-liam [9] https://go.govbrief.today/ice-contempt-order [10] https://go.govbrief.today/paxton-abortion-pill [11] https://go.govbrief.today/va-redistricting-ruling [12] https://go.govbrief.today/az-cbp-shooting [13] https://go.govbrief.today/abbott-blocks-h1b [14] https://go.govbrief.today/minn-ecuador-consulate [15] https://go.govbrief.today/minn-special-elections [16] https://go.govbrief.today/noem-impeach-threat [17] https://go.govbrief.today/ntsb-dca [18] https://go.govbrief.today/glass-cancels-kenctr [19] https://go.govbrief.today/nyc-hotel-protest [20] https://go.govbrief.today/ma-wind-project Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com
